basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Abdullah Moursi. A Resourceful Front End Web Developer bringing in-depth knowledge of latest technology trends to produce clean website design. Experience in handling complex HTML, CSS, and JS (Vanilla and React), and a bit of VueJS to meet the organization's front-facing internet needs. Thank you.

projects.title: Texas restaurant
projects.description: Fried chicken restaurant website consuming APIs for making different routes through Params with justifiable ingredients and cart items using NextJS, Redux and CSS Modules.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.description: MERN-Stack AMAZON Clone consuming an API for the products using React JS in front-end, Firebase as a cloud function, Stripe for payment and MongoDB, Express and NodeJs in back-end.

projects.title: Bosta Clone
projects.description: One of the most challenging projects I've worked on. Consumed the company's API to create a tracking system using React, Bootstrap, Element UI and i18next. You can try tracking with these numbers: (9442984, 1094442, 663623).

projects.title: Genome Analyzer
projects.description: Took a part at creating an app comparing DNA sequence provided by patients with the ones in the GenBank. Developed UI of Admin, Doctor, Nurse, and Patient pages using Vue.Js, Element-UI, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: SARS Mutation Prediction
projects.description: Worked with a team of backend developers to create a model to predict the upcoming mutations of Covid-19. Consumed data from multiple REST APIs showing them in a responsive design using Axios, ReactJS, React Modal, TypeScript, Material UI, and SASS.

projects.title: E-Commerce
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for an authenticated Log-in page and search filters using CSS3 and uiGradients. For storing data we used Redux and React Context.
